text: Sheikh Sulaiman bin Abdulaziz Al Rajhi (Arabic سليمان بن عبد العزيز الراجحي, born 1924) is a Saudi Arabian business figure and billionaire. As of 2011, his wealth was estimated by Forbes to be $7.7 billion, making him the 120th richest person in the world. He received the 2012 King Faisal International Prize for dedicating half his fortune to charity, starting an Islamic bank, supporting charity work and implementing effective national projects. ==References== ==Other websites== * Sulaiman Abdul Aziz Al Rajhi * Profile: Sulaiman Abdul Aziz al-Rajhi * Sulaiman Al Rajhi University Category:1924 births Category:Living people Category:Saudi Arabian businesspeople Category:Billionaires
title: Sulaiman Abdul Aziz Al Rajhi
